definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pierce, pierce through (NH id., Aram. [[דְּקַר]], dqar)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[דָּקָָרוּ]] Zec 12:10; sf. [[וּדְקָרֻנִי]] consec. 1Sa 31:4, [[וּדְקָרֻהוּ]] consec. Zec 13:3; Impf. [[וַיִּדְקׂר]] Nu 25:8, [[וַיִּדְקְרֵהוּ]] Ju Jdg 9:54—pierce, run through (always c. acc.): as retributive act, Israelite and Midianit. woman Nu 25:8; false prophet Zec 13:3; but also as speedy death Ju Jdg 9:54 (Abimelech); 1Sa 31:4 a (Saul) = 1Ch 10:4, also 1Sa 31:4 b (but del. Be We after 1Ch 10:4 & so LXXL 1Sa 31:4 b), see also Zec 12:10 (cf. Jn 19:37).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִדָּקֵר]] be pierced through, slain Is 13:15 (in conquest of Bab. by Medes).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[מְדֻקָּרִים]] pierced, riddled, (i.e. desperately wounded) warriors, Je 37:10, slain Je 51:4 (‖[[חללים]]); by hunger La 4:9 (‖[[חַלְלֵי רָעָב]]).
